website_summaries.verdict: A mid-level hand mixer with features for various mixing tasks. However, it may not be up to heavy-duty jobs.
pros: Combines a lightweight design with an impressive feature set that includes balloon whisk, dough hooks, and turbo button
cons: Attachments feel a bit flimsy, and the low speed has very little power

customer_reviews.title: One of the reviews said it was good at whisking up mashed potatoes and that made me ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when I saw the wire whisks as apposed to the thin blade whisks that my old Hand Mixer had. One of the reviews said it was good at whisking up mashed potatoes and that made me take the plunge. It's one thing to mix batter, cake mix etc., but potatoes are a stronger test and this mixer passes that test with flying colors. I love it. Does a great job and is very pretty to look at. The red color is fabulous and I love that it has added attachments with the dough hooks and balloon whisk. Very content with this purchase and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Segal

customer_reviews.title: These are the bent beaters..
customer_reviews.text: My wife said the color was nice and red. It has more speeds then her old one and it came with many more mixing gadgets then her old one. Have not used as of yet.. UPDATE:::::: My wife used the mixer today, Jan 8th and while mixing coohie dough, one of the beaters bent and got hooked up on the other. I have enclosed a photo showing the beaters. Please advise if we can receive a replacement set. Also, my wife said the mixer motor is very power and the wire beaters just are not up for that power. Please advise what we can expect. Regards, Scott Wood
customer_reviews.author: SD Wood

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mixer for an Amazingly Low Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I had originally purchased the 5 speed KitchenAid model only to return it because it was woefully underpowered. I bought this mixer for a lot less money and am extremely pleased with this product. Not only did it come with attachments that were extra for the KitchenAid mixer, it also came with a lot more power! It mashes potatoes perfectly! I highly recommend this mixer!
customer_reviews.author: SMM

customer_reviews.title: metal chipped off beaters!
customer_reviews.text: Mixer worked fine, but after 9 months, some of the metal started chipping off of the bottoms of the beaters. So, we were eating metal??!! My old mixer had solid stainless beaters, and I had thought these were too, but the metal underneath is a copper type color.
customer_reviews.author: quizout

customer_reviews.title: from egg whites and whipped cream to cookie dough and I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This appliance works as described. It's lightweight but strong as advertised. I have not yet used the dough hooks and probably would not because I prefer to knead yeasted dough the old fashioned way. But it works well, from egg whites and whipped cream to cookie dough and I am happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Ward

customer_reviews.title: So I like the color
customer_reviews.text: So I like the color. When I got it I thought the beaters would not hold up. They are not a solid metal like traditional beaters, but rather thin and flimsy. I was using them on some sticks of butter for a batter, 1st use, and one of the beaters broke off the stem and was all bent up. The butter was semi soft. Luckily I still had my old trustworthy mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer... unless you need the warranty!  Horrible companyt!
customer_reviews.text: Let me say, first off, I love this mixer. HOWEVER, the customer service is HORRIBLE! Just within the 1 year warranty period one of my beaters broke, so I contacted Domu/VonShef to have it replaced. They REFUSED to help me because it was not purchased directly through them. Mind you, I purchased it directly from Amazon as a brand new item. Yet, they would not help. I was not even trying to replace the mixer itself... just the beater that broke from regular use. DO NOT BUY ANY DOMU BRAND PRODUCTS AS THEY WILL NOT STAND BEHIND THEIR PRODUCT OR HONOR THEIR OWN WARRANTY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dancemom23

customer_reviews.title: worth it, somewhat good, but nothing more.
customer_reviews.text: Was it worth it's price? yes. Around $21. The slowest speed on this hand mixer was way too fast. This is a huge issue because I bought it for its multiple speeds. Yes there are still multiple speeds. I'd say, fast, faster, even faster, fastest and turbo instead of slow, medium, fast, faster, turbo. But it is cheap and seemingly well made, and the replaceable whisks is good. The quality does correspond to the price. But don't buy it for its multiple speeds.
customer_reviews.author: rolexTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I purchased this mixer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't familiar with this brand and was hesitant to order it but it had good reviews so I decided to give it a try. I'm glad I did. So far it's been a good mixer. It's comfortable to hold. I like the way it rests on the counter. It seems plenty strong (although I can't imagine using its dough hooks) and is quiet. I'm having trouble adjusting to the speed control button moving from side to side instead of up and down but that's my only negative and that's a small issue and it could very well be only an issue to me. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This VonShef mixer looked like a beautiful race car when I got it out ...
customer_reviews.text: After using my old hand mixer for the pat 25 years, it finally broke down, how lucky am I! This VonShef mixer looked like a beautiful race car when I got it out of the package! First thing I used it for was to make some rosemary dinner rolls, which required the dough beater--wow. What a difference. I really love this cute little mixer.
customer_reviews.author: kim campbell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best cheap hand mixer to buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given this a good 6month trial period before writing a review but I could’ve done it after the first use. I had an older Hamilton Beach that had gotten to the point that it only had the top speed working so a replacement was needed. This VonShef is so pitiful at top speed. I’d say it makes it to about half the speed of the Hamilton Beach. Whipping cream takes twice as long also creaming butter/sugar is an ordeal. I don’t recommend this mixer at all.
customer_reviews.author: Julie D.

customer_reviews.title: The beaters x2 SHOW THE WHOLE MSG.
customer_reviews.text: The beaters are the WORST OF I HAVE EVER USED!#!#!! I have been A Baker for over 28 yrs and I'm Very Disappointed that you would put so much Money into A GREAT Mixer and Then put it with HORRIBLE TOOL'S!!#!#!##!! SO NOW I HAVE TO FIND SOME NEW BEATERS AND HOPE THAT THEY FIT!!#!! THANKS A LOT VONSHELF. So can Amazon find me some other beaters, the one's that I remember back in the day?? Because the one's that come with the VONSHELF are USELESS FOR MAKING CAKES AND ICINGS.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I've turned into a baker recently and need a mixer ASAP as I knew it would help me mix my ingredients more quickly and effectively. I love it. I like that my kids can use it too. Most of my small appliances are red so I am very happy that it fits in with the rest!! I also use it about once or twice a week. It's holding up well!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a really reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to complain about this product. It does everything the way it should. I believe it is also quieter in compare to other mixers. It's light, has 6 speeds with a turbo button so you can go max speed immediately without switching speeds. Whiskers are solid material, they feel sturdy. I have been using this mixer a while now and am one happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Konrad P. Makowski

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be decieving!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color, and the lightweightness was a big plus as my arm tires easily. It was easy to put together and take apart to clean. It really wasn't used very often however so imagine my surprise when upon starting it up to mix a cake mix the beaters struggled to turn do I turned it off to make sure that I had inserted the beaters correctly. When finished I turned it back on and it immediately started to make popping sounds and smoked alot so I immediately unplugged it! So sad and disappointing. Its likely that I wont buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just wasn't as powerful as my other one...
customer_reviews.text: I just found it took longer to get my cream to whip. I don't know if it was the skinny blades or if it just wasn't as powerful as my Oster. I put this one in the camper and bought (2) sets of beaters for my Oster.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. HUDSON

customer_reviews.title: Better than the sunbeam
customer_reviews.text: Ok this mixer came packaged well and quickly. I had a sunbeam hand mixer that went out on me. It was cheap so whatever no shade on the sunbeam makers. But I love my new mixer. It’s actually pretty and not nearly as loud as the sunbeam I had previously. It’s not silent by any means but it’s not super loud and annoying. #happyshopper
customer_reviews.author: Missagape

customer_reviews.title: good device, good support
customer_reviews.text: good device - powerful enough for most tasks (creaming butter that's *not quite* at room temperature), easy to clean, solid construction. Mine broke after 6 months. Customer support was incredible and replaced without question, using Amazon order number. Just seems solid.
customer_reviews.author: JamesM

customer_reviews.title: Handy mixer - attachments thin
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I love the ergonomics. The only downfall i see is the attachments. They are very thin and I wonder how well they hold up to any orrssues. Since I have a kitchen aide I will leave the hard stuff to that. This will be used more for liquidity stuff like cake mix and pudding.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Paint started peeling after first use
customer_reviews.text: I used this mixer twice. It wasn't until the second time that I noticed flecks of red paint flaking off the bottom of the mixer and into my food. There was a thin coating of metal that also started flaking off of the beaters into my food as well. The beaters began rusting right away. Unless you want to eat mystery pieces of metal and paint in your food, don't buy this mixer! I'm returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mixer
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mixer. Does what I want and doesn't fool around, have a Beautiful color to it too. I never heard of this brand before, but it had everything I wanted in a hand mixer, glad I went with this brand. Beats the heck out of my other hand mixer that hit the garbage once I tried this beauty out.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Heilman

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little mixer. Haven't had any problems I just have problems getting the hooks to release when I push the button. But for a younger cook with strong hands it is probably just fine. I've used the whisk and beaters. Haven't tried the Dough hook and am pleased with this little mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Sindi McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This had mixer is nice and easy to use It is compact and does not take a lot of space Easy to clean too Has been using it for over a year with no issues
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a hand mixer. I looked at several brands, including a Kitchen Aid, but felt it was unnecessary to spend $50-70.00 on this type of appliance. I decided to purchase this mixer because of the attachments, as well as the color. The item arrived nicely packaged. I've used it twice and I am extremely glad I chose this mixer. It was affordable and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: As good as a stand mixer!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a stand mixer because I work with cream cheese alot. But I bought this instead of a stand mixer. And it works great! It has slow speeds and super high speeds. All of the mixing tools were very sturdy. If it ever breaks I will buy another. All in all I am very happy I didn't spend a lot for a stand mixer. This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Justin L.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your time or money. I only have used this a few times and the beater broke while making cookies.....it's junk. Pretty sure I can't get my money back since I bought it 3 months ago but as I said, I have only used it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: OzarkNana

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good power for size
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and good power for size. Dough hooks and beaters are not the same strength as those used for full sized mixers, but this mixer is designed for smaller jobs. Works great for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIGHTWEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight this mixer is. Really good for people like me with Arthritis, Carpel Tunnel, etc. Works really well!
customer_reviews.author: rosemary williams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a hand mixer that I had for 10 years. It was doing a good job mixing my dips and whipping cream, but after only using a handful of times a screw fell out of the mixer and into my food. I had my husband who can fix anything and we never could find where the screw fell from. The left side would no longer hold the beaters and work properly. Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a joke
customer_reviews.text: What a joke, the whole unit looks like something you want to give your daughter. Low quality whisks, very thin and SUPER SHORT. Whisks only fit in very shallow containers, they are that short.
customer_reviews.author: Watership Down

customer_reviews.title: A Great Handmixer
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love the color, but it works fantastically!!! I make sure to always wash and dry the beaters immediately after use and have not had the issue some mentioned of having theirs rust. My mixer gets a work out in my kitchen and it is a solid workhorse. I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this attractive mixer to mix cake batter and whip cream. It is sturdy and doesn't over heat with extended use. I haven't tried the attachment for making dough, but I am pleased with all I've used it for so far. It's pretty and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: an honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new mixer
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mixer. The color is so vibrant and I love having all of the attachments so I don't have to get my Kitchen Aid out all the time . It would have been nice if it had a storage for the mixer and the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back because it over heated on its first use. The attachments are weak and cheaply made. Such a bummer because the handheld part is very beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it dies
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little mixer! It was amazing. Lightweight and quieter than my old one. Three stars for longevity, it only lasted about a year. I was making meringue and it up and died on me mid mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the dynamic red color
customer_reviews.text: I especially like the dynamic red color, perfect for Christmas. I have only used the regular beaters so far and they work perfectly. Looking forward to being able to use it with the other attachments.
customer_reviews.author: paul mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: great little beater for the money
customer_reviews.text: for the price it is an attractive hand mixer. it really whisks briskly on the fast speed. haven’t tried the dough hooks since i hand knead dough. but the other beaters performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Sazama

customer_reviews.title: i threw it away
customer_reviews.text: it broke easily.. while making dough for bread.. it was not easy to hold.. it used get tired easily.. heat up and stop running.. that was what it was good at...
customer_reviews.author: Bhargava

customer_reviews.title: I love this hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and used it for some cream cheese icing. I love this hand mixer. I got the matching stand mixer as a gift, but I love the hand mixer much more than the stand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for old 10 year hand ixer. Beaters seemed thiner than my old ones, but work great. Only problem I didnt notice was this mixer does not have a storage space for the cord.
customer_reviews.author: pondigger

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed. I would not recommend you buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I just received this mixer. I unwrapped it to check it out and as soon as I pulled the first beater out of the plastic it was tarnished. Not so much tarnished as the coating was gone in many spots and all I could see was black. I gave it the benefit of the doubt and tried to wash it off but no, I was correct the coating was gone in several places. I am so disappointed. I would not recommend you buy this product. I should have listened to other reviewers. I will be returning it as quickly as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Love all the different options for mixing. Very nice looking, have not used it yet. Would be a good gift, but this one is for me.
customer_reviews.author: RedFox

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Hand Mixer!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile and powerful. I am loving this company's products (I have a small powerful vacuum from it too.) I am glad I didn't spend $$$ on KitchenAid mixers. With less $$$ you get tools as powerful but a lot less bulky.
customer_reviews.author: JYC

customer_reviews.title: Love the Whisk on this mixer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mixer! Right off I used the whisk and, since I'd made whipped cream by hand the day before, I appreciated the time savings and arm muscles. Love the red too!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Jewell

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little surprise! I didn't much of it because of it's price, but this mixer is great. It boast this beautiful metallic red, which matches my appliances btw. But, it's a great find. It does way more than I expected. I'm very happy with this purchase. You won't regret it especially in it's price point.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great value when it comes to mixers.
customer_reviews.text: I've use this next her a few times so far, and it absolutely works as advertised. For the price point, I believe this would be a hard mixer to beat!
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: I liked them, and hope my family members will also
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these items for a gift to give. I liked them, and hope my family members will also!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spilotro

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as the one I had before. It's fine if you're just making the occasional dessert or whatever but wouldn't recommend for heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few uses, don't wait to try it, use it when you first get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beaters are cheap-rust and break
customer_reviews.text: This mixer is a great price and the it is a turbo motor, so the motor seems to have held up over the past year since I purchased it. However, one of the beaters just broke. I believe this is due to cheap quality metal and where the metal joins the base piece started to rust and then broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this hand mixer because it has real beater blades. Wisk and dough mixer are great extras.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. Used it to mix cake batter and make dough.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous candy apple red paint job! Oh, and it mixes great too! :) Extra bread hooks & balloon beater are definite pluses. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dantry

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! Also another item I don't immediate review as a person who cooks and bakes often until I good a good use out of it first. Mainly after two birthday parties, baby shower, and work retirement party. It works wonderfully and hopefully still so for another coming birthday at the end of this month.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, the extra turbo speed button doesn’t do much, all in all in happy
customer_reviews.author: J. Grigsby

customer_reviews.title: The beaters wobble and the wire part of them is ...
customer_reviews.text: The beaters wobble and the wire part of them is flimsy. The whole thing just feels cheap. I'm sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: Seth C. Short

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with product, I used it non stop during the holiday season and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: MrAllGrain

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This electric beater is great. It's quiet and efficient. My only problem is that there were several small Nicks in it when it arrived. Tiny, But annoying.
customer_reviews.author: rflorez

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned up.
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working on July 4th when I was making a desert. Purchased in December 2017 and the motor just burned up, there was smoke coming out of it.(my daughter filmed it). Only used it about 6 times. Very disappointed .When she gets home I will upload the video.
customer_reviews.author: W. McElligott

customer_reviews.title: I love the shiny red color
customer_reviews.text: I love the shiny red color. I used it for the first time tonight, it worked beautifully. I have only used the beaters so far to make molasses bars, but I know the mixer has the power to be able handle everything.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Lange

customer_reviews.title: Love the red color
customer_reviews.text: Love the whisk attachment. We think it made the pancakes fluffier! This hand mixer replaced the one we've had for 50 years!
customer_reviews.author: DFM

customer_reviews.title: but it works great. Made very creamy potatoes
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned because the beater attachments were thin, but it works great. Made very creamy potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It does alright on thin liquids, but not anything you'd actually need a hand mixer for. Eggs; yes n Cookie dough; not so much.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy beaters
customer_reviews.text: Good mixer, but the beater attachments broke after just a couple uses. Thankfully I found some other sturdy attachments that fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What I've used I like.
customer_reviews.text: I like this electric mixer very much. The eject button was a little stiff at first but no biggie. I tried all the attachments before using the mixer with food. I gave it 4 stars because it's still too soon to give it 5.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Mazzia

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great mixer! Very sturdy and the parts fit well. They were a little hard to eject at first, but after a few times, the eject button loosened up a little bit. The turbo button is a nice feature as well!
customer_reviews.author: Giwdul

customer_reviews.title: Not dependable!
customer_reviews.text: With minimal use, it stopped working in only 15 months
customer_reviews.author: leslie c

customer_reviews.title: After three months, one of the mixer tools,
customer_reviews.text: After three months, one of the mixer tools, the post spins on the whipper and does not grip the whippers enough to hold a strong liquid
customer_reviews.author: Real

customer_reviews.title: Very Weak Motor
customer_reviews.text: Was okay for cake batter, but really strained when making cookies. The dough gets stuck in the beaters and it feels like the motor will burn out. Not enough power. Cheaply made. I bought it only 3 months ago and only used it a handful of times. I'm already planning to buy a different mixer.
customer_reviews.author: kris10d

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer
customer_reviews.text: This is a find. It not only is a mixer but also has whisk and baking attachments!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: The first one had burnt smell after using it once ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one had burnt smell after using it once. When I used it the second time, it stopped working. I contacted Amazon and had it replaced within 3 weeks. The replaced one started having burnt smell recently, and stopped working just now (1 month and three days over). I'd return it to Amazon & get my money back but refund period is already over.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Pham

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk...broke after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Beater broke after two weeks. Thus would’ve gotten 1 star anyways, however, because of the weak motor and slowest speed setting still being much too fast. Should’ve known for the price it would be junk. Thankfully, mine broke within the eligible return period.
customer_reviews.author: Michael David

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy...with reservations
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. It works awesome for small jobs, but it does overheat easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabearruns

customer_reviews.title: A solid little mixer
customer_reviews.text: Good, powerful, low price. I used this for the ultimate mixer test: An unstablized, full egg, dark chocolate mousse. It came out absolutely beautiful. Eggs and sugar whipped up to a full emulsion in less than three minutes. The heavy cream came up to stiff peaks in only fours minutes (in a chilled bowl). Only complaint is the attachment arms are a little short, wouldn't work well in a deep bowl. Will see if holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: Eataylor667

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer. I use for quick jobs when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mixer. I use for quick jobs when I don’t want to drag out the stand mixer. Gets the job done. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is what happened to the mixer after a few uses. I had to buy another pair!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value for Money...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product for the price. Easy to handle and use. Does precisely what it says. I would definitely recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Manohar Rao Mankala

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the first time I used it. Was not satisfied at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality, works well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost 6 months. It works well and have made many a cookie dough and mashed potatoes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: The mixer is beautiful to look at. It seems to work just fine, although one would worry about the thin beaters holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: We love this hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: We love this hand mixer! Works so much better than a kitchen aid and comes with extra attachments. Also super fun color!
customer_reviews.author: CD climb

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good mixer for the price. Has good power/speed. Like the different attachments. stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: great mixer.  you will love it !!!!
customer_reviews.text: the colour is great. I didn't have a red mixer. my kitchen appliences are red I saw this one and thought i would try it.. is wonderful. I don't do a lot of heavey cooking ... this one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: shirley

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Works well for casual baking use. It does not seem as powerful as perhaps a higher end machine but definitely still gets the job done! Perfect purchase for people on a budget that just need a simple hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, flimsy beaters
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mixer maybe a total of 6X since purchase. One of the beaters had started to wobble during the last use and today it totally broke! Right in the middle of mixing my cookie dough! Pretty color doesn't offset the cheap beaters!
customer_reviews.author: Elia

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law loves this product. I gave it to her as a gift, she said it was the first electric mixer she ever used or had and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I especially like the beaters being thin wires- sticky dough doesnt glob onto them. It has great power.
customer_reviews.author: tampagrl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not useful
customer_reviews.text: Lasted for only 3 uses. It was pretty but not durable at all. Broke in the middle of use. Should have known it was too good to be true.
customer_reviews.author: JayCeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Rusts easily- terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my hand mixer attachments started to rust after 5 years of usage. This one literally rusted after 1 use. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: B&A Davis

customer_reviews.title: Only OK for VonShef RED 250W Hand Mixer Whisk With Chrome Beater, Dough Hook, 5 Speed and Turbo Button + FREE Balloon Whisk
customer_reviews.text: Nice color; dough hooks very helpful. Power isn't great. What made me return it, though, was the Turbo Button didn't work/did nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Handeezhoney63

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for. It was time for my old one to go after many years os service. Needed something similar to it for those quick jobs in the kitchen instead of using the big mixer this fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Gyrlgne5150

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the third use! A screw fell out from somewhere and the whisks won't stay in place. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: iansholidayhouse

customer_reviews.title: I do love how light weight it is
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item and took it out of the shipping box, the box the mixer was in was open. When I pulled the hand motor out I was shocked to see food splattered on it and the cord. So obviously this was used(who knows how many times) and returned. I do love how light weight it is. And I would have given 5 stars had I received a new, unused mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This hand mixer has been great. It has good power and does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: This hand mixer has been great. It has good power and does the job nicely. Wishing I would have bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFourGirls

customer_reviews.title: I love the color but I have not had a chance ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the color but I have not had a chance to use it yet. I will update my review after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Great hand held!
customer_reviews.text: Great, handy, and powerful for it's size. Stands easily on its own while scraping down the sides of batter bowls. Great idea...Turbo button. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gruch1

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: One of the beaters broke the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dubble

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this handmixer. It is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this hand mixer. It is cheaply made and the motor has very little power. It is barely able to mix cake batter efficiently. There is a turbo power button that doesn't really work. I am throwing mine in the trash and buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: M2KDS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this mixer, quite well built. Perfect for regular needs. Love the disk design
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kessler

customer_reviews.text: very powerful needed a new one and the price is great for what you get much more than I expected
